programme.title: If I Only Had Christmas
programme.desc: At Christmas, a cheerful publicist teams up with a cynical VP and his eclectic team to help a charity in need.

programme.title: Nantucket Noel
programme.desc: During the Seaside Noel celebrations, Christina discovers that a developer plans to tear down the wharf that houses her toy store. But tensions rise as she begins to fall for the developer's son.

programme.title: Christmas She Wrote
programme.desc: A romance writer has her column cancelled right before Christmas, so she heads home to reconnect with her family and sparks some romance of her own.

programme.title: Christmas She Wrote
programme.desc: A romance writer has her column cancelled right before Christmas, so she heads home to reconnect with her family and sparks some romance of her own.

programme.title: A Shoe Addict's Christmas
programme.desc: A self-professed 'Christmas hater' is locked in a department store on Christmas Eve. There, she meets a woman who claims to be her 'guardian angel' and shares with her three Christmas ghosts.

programme.title: Christmas in Rome
programme.desc: An American tour guide working in Rome agrees to give a tour to a businessman. The two quickly learn that when in Rome, love prevails.

programme.title: Christmas at the Palace
programme.desc: A woman agrees to help put on a skating pageant for a Christmas obsessed kingdom. Her joy, and love for the sport, catches the eye of the king, and they instantly fall for each other.

programme.title: Crashing Through the Snow
programme.desc: A couple decide to crash their family’s perfect Christmas celebration.

programme.title: Jingle Around the Clock
programme.desc: A woman plans a Christmas to remember with her college friends, only to be thwarted by an opportunity she can't pass up. Much to her surprise, she is forced to team up with a man who has a completely different view of what Christmas really means.

programme.title: Christmas at Dollywood
programme.desc: When a NYC event planner returns to Tennessee to plan the Christmas celebration at Dollywood, she's paired with the head of operations who thinks he can handle the party just fine on his own.

programme.title: Five Star Christmas
programme.desc: When a travel writer shows up unexpectedly at their dad's B&B, the Ralston family all pretend to be guests in hopes of a good review.

programme.title: A Christmas Treasure
programme.desc: Lou wonders if she should move to New York and continue working on her writing career after opening a 100-year-old time capsule and meeting a charming chef.

programme.title: Next Stop, Christmas
programme.desc: Angie plans to spend Christmas on her own, but her commuter ride suddenly becomes a Christmas train, and it takes her to her home town in the year 2011.

programme.title: Nantucket Noel
programme.desc: During the Seaside Noel celebrations, Christina discovers that a developer plans to tear down the wharf that houses her toy store. But tensions rise as she begins to fall for the developer's son.

programme.title: A Christmas Together With You
programme.desc: Megan and her father figure, Frank, decide to take a holiday road trip together in the hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: On the 12th Date of Christmas
programme.desc: Two co-workers vying for the same promotion are tasked with creating a 12 Days of Christmas scavenger hunt to promote the premiere of a new hotel.

programme.title: On the 12th Date of Christmas
programme.desc: Two co-workers vying for the same promotion are tasked with creating a 12 Days of Christmas scavenger hunt to promote the premiere of a new hotel.

programme.title: A Christmas Detour
programme.desc: Two NYC-bound travellers find themselves linked when a storm waylays their flight to an airport hotel in Buffalo. Desperate to get home in time for Christmas, a woman seeks help, in any form, to make a Christmas miracle happen.

programme.title: Picture a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A world-travelling photographer takes some time off at Christmas to care for her grandmother. While there, she meets her neighbour, who needs help caring for his young nephew, and love develops.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Promise
programme.desc: Two strangers who share a disdain for Christmas navigate their holiday complications together by creating The Mistletoe Promise. As they spend more time with each other, they discover there may be more to their contract.

programme.title: The Christmas House
programme.desc: When a TV star's parents ask him to bring back a revered family tradition, he revisits the family's traditions and brings back the magic of Christmases past.

programme.title: The Christmas Cottage
programme.desc: An interior designer is made-of-honour at her friend’s wedding. Before the big day, she ends up stranded in the Christmas Cottage, where rumour has it, all guests will find everlasting love, with the brother of the bride.

programme.title: A Nashville Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A television producer is forced to work with the man who broke her heart on a country music Christmas special while being interrupted by Christmas spirits determined for her to revisit her past.

programme.title: The Most Wonderful Time of the Year
programme.desc: A single mother who's lost all interest in Christmas finds just what she needs when her uncle comes to visit.

programme.title: A Crown for Christmas
programme.desc: After getting fired from her job at a ritzy NYC hotel, a woman accepts a job as a governess to a young girl. She finds herself attracted to the girl’s father, who is king of the country, and love reigns over the kingdom.

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: A woman loses her job and beau on the same day and reluctantly accepts a position in Alaska. When she gets the position she originally hoped for, she must choose between a life she's always wanted and her new life in Alaska.
